name: A tourist in Paris
description:
A tourist in Paris

Tourist: noun, /'toorəst/. Person geographically and culturally lost, trying to cross iconic monuments off their bucket list before their tour bus departs.

This game was created for JS13KGAMES 2017 on the theme "Lost".

Goal: You have 2 minutes to visit all the monuments in Paris before your tour bus leaves for the next European capital.

Controls: arrow keys / WASD (Englih keybard) / ZQSD (French keyboard) on desktop, or swipe screen on mobile (think of screen as a D-Pad)

How to play: visit monuments by touching the red blinking squares, then catch your tour bus by touching the blue blinking square in the colorful maze representing Paris. Enter the Konami code before choosing a difficulty to activate the "wobble" mode.

Web Monetization: Coil subscribers receive 20% more time to explore Paris
